how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: Stake Pool Operator [KOWLN]. Based in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Web 3.0 is here, and Cardano is at the forfront of this evolution. Keep spreading the word!
about.server: All nodes on baremetal, no virtualization. 2 Relays, 1 BP. 3.2Hz, 16Gb Ram. Hot-standby UPS. Constantly upgrading to meet up with demand.
